nodes.speaker: future_tech_guy
nodes.text: I am Tom Psion. I represent Forward FutureTech Technology.

nodes.speaker: future_tech_guy
nodes.text: See! That's what I told them! But apparently, we were created by merging the companies "Future Industrial Technology" and "Forward SciTech Co". If you think that's bad. You should hear our motto.

responses.text: So. What are you doing here?

nodes.speaker: future_tech_guy
nodes.text: Forward FutureTech Technology: Looking forwards to the future of technology to provide a bright future.

responses.text: Anyway, what are you doing here?

nodes.speaker: future_tech_guy
nodes.text: We're here to tell people about Forward FutureTech Technology.

responses.text: Do you have anything cool with you?

nodes.speaker: future_tech_guy
nodes.text: Well, both "Future Industrial Technology" and "Forward SciTech Co" have been around for a while. About 50 years, ago, the two merged into "Forward FutureTech Technology." Back then, we were struggling to get funds. Luckily, Anthony Calahan invested in our company. Since then, we've been doing great!

responses.text: Do you have anything cool with you?

nodes.speaker: future_tech_guy
nodes.text: We make all sorts of things. We've made force fields, ion swords, holographic chairs. We also make more mundane stuff that's styled to look like it would belong in a SciFy movie.

responses.text: Do you have anything cool with you?

nodes.speaker: future_tech_guy
nodes.text: It looks like a chair, but is just a hologram. Yeah. I don't know why'd you want it either.

nodes.speaker: future_tech_guy
nodes.text: Not really. We are giving out free lamps.

nodes.speaker: future_tech_guy
nodes.text: No. It's just a boring lamp.
